item.title: Arkansas Little Library Project - Home
item.description: The Arkansas Little Library Project is an organization located in Arkansas, that hopes to place books in locations in Arkansas, that don't have many libraries, books, or content. Or if homeowners and communities don't have a little library and might want one.

item.title: Contact Partners|Associations
item.description: The Arkansas Little Library Project's official online directory for contacting us and our partners and associations.

item.title: Arkansas Little Library Project - Poll
item.description: In order to build our little library, we need to know if our community wants or needs one.

item.title: ALL STAFF
item.description: This is the complete list for the official Staff of the Arkansas Little Library Project(A.L.L).
